content: with only a few basic stitches you can knit this cute and colourful **rainbow caterpillar** knit purl a kfb increase and k2tog decrease designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the caterpillar is knitted in acrylic dk yarns on single pointed needles not in the round **needles** a pair of 3mm single pointed knitting needles us 2 5 **recommended yarn** deramores studio baby soft dk double knitting/light worsted weight a few grammes in each colour **notions** tapestry needle toy filling beads for eyes scraps of felt fabric and embroidery thread **sizes** one size only - 29cm long **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include casting on and off knitting stripes and seaming to finish **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 3 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2020 amanda berry all rights reserved **danish translation available from** https //strikkeglad dk/40187/regnbuelarve/ 1 a huge thank you to marianne for the translation 1 https //strikkeglad dk/40187/regnbuelarve/
